entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Drifting snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
